cosmetic.type.gadget.name: Gadgets
cosmetic.type.gadget.description: Use the gagdgets using the village technology to make fun toys appear!
cosmetic.type.pet.name: Pets
cosmetic.type.pet.description: These strange creatures are roaming around the lobby island... Capture them and collect them all!
cosmetic.type.particle.name: Particles
cosmetic.type.particle.description: Use the ancient spells to make particles appear and show your swag all over the lobby!
cosmetic.type.balloon.name: Balloons
cosmetic.type.balloon.description: Equip your balloon by walking around the lobby. Be careful not to fly away!
cosmetic.type.bridger.name: Bridger
cosmetic.type.bridger.description: Discover the cosmetics available in the Bridger game mode. Buy blocks or bridge destruction effects with your Hyris!
cosmetic.type.bedwars.name: Bedwars
cosmetic.type.bedwars.description: Discover the cosmetics available in the BedWars game mode. Use your Hyris to buy different blocks, kills or even bed shattering effects!
cosmetic.particle.fire_invocation.name: Invocation of fire
cosmetic.particle.fire_invocation.descri: Invocation of the depths of the flames.
cosmetic.particle.gem_invocation.name: Invocation of gems
cosmetic.particle.gem_invocation.descrip: Invocation of the strength of gems.
cosmetic.particle.portal_invocation.name: Interdimensional invocation
cosmetic.particle.enchanted.name: Enchanted
cosmetic.particle.step_in_the_air.name: Step in the air
cosmetic.particle.step_in_the_air.descri: Allows you to do a double jump!
cosmetic.particle.rainbow_twins.name: Rainbow twins
cosmetic.particle.rainbow_twins.descript: Two little rainbows that follow you.
cosmetic.particle.black_vortex.name: Black vortex
cosmetic.particle.black_vortex.descripti: A black vortex taking you to the depths of hell.
cosmetic.pet.snowman.name: Snowman
cosmetic.pet.snowman.description: No matter the season, he is always there (not that he likes the sun...)
cosmetic.pet.mini_me.name: Mini me
cosmetic.pet.mini_me.description: It looks strangely like you... strange...
cosmetic.pet.reaper.name: Reaper
cosmetic.pet.reaper.description: Do you really want to hang out with death? As you wish...
cosmetic.pet.ghost.name: Ghost
cosmetic.pet.ghost.description: He is nice, all migon, but.. BOUH!
